awd_titl_txt: Support of Travel for Establishing U.S.-Brazil CollaborativeResearch in Metallic and Ceramic Materials
awd_abstract_narration: Engineers and scientists, with expertise in                                     advanced metallic and ceramic materials, from                                   United States and Brazil will participate in                                    workshops, seminars and visits to take place                                    in both countries.  The purpose of these                                        activities is to establish the basis for                                        collaborative research in these areas of high                                   interest to both countries and in fulfillment                                   of the goals of the ongoing United States-                                      Brazil Science and Technology Initiative.
org_div_long_name: Division of Civil, Mechanical, and Manufacturing Innovation

inst.inst_name: Regents of the University of Idaho
inst.org_lgl_bus_name: REGENTS OF THE UNIVERSITY OF IDAHO
